name: Combat Warfare Online
description:
Hi there! My name is Juan, and I have created a small third person game prototype using assets from the market stores. 

The idea of the game is that you will be able to create team's squads like Seal team, ground team and air team to fight real players on a large-scale map. 

example 
Team A will defend a location and Team B has to attack the defended location your team will have different roles to play like a squad will be operating a submarine or a Spy plane monitoring the sky and giving support to the ground team etc...

You need a high-end PC To be able to play 

To open the game  follow this instruction

extract the files 

next it will says

 Windows protected your PC 

just click on more info

And press Run Anyway

Discord Server link

https://discord.gg/arfmkWgx28

Support Me on Patreon if you want to see this game on full release 

Patreon Link

https://www.patreon.com/CombatWarfareOnline

With your money we will be hiring programmers, 3d artis, sound engineer etc...
You will be able to see the budget spending.
With your help this game can be completed
